Title: Photo Gallery Wall C#
Description:
The original Photo Gallery Wall application was created by Jeffrey Paries (http://designwithsilverlight.com/2008/01/31/photo-gallery-wall). It was written using Microsoft Silverlight 1.0 and JavaScript, but works for Silverlight 2. 
This version is written in C#.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight Application: Photo Gallery Wall in C#

The original version of Photo Gallery Wall was created by Jeff Paries. Though this application was based on Microsoft Silverlight 1.0 and JavaScript, it works in Silverlight 2. This C# version involves converting the JavaScript code to C# while the visual designs are kept unchanged.

The source code of the original application is available for download at http://designwithsilverlight.com/2008/01/31/photo-gallery-wall, thanks to Jeff for his great work in putting together this creative application.
